original_text: It was the sound of the wings of the living creatures as they touched one another, and the sound of the wheels beside them, and the sound of a great earthquake.
korean_text: 이는 생물들의 날개가 서로 부딪치는 소리와 생물 곁의 바퀴 소리라 크게 울리는 소리더라

sentences.original_text: the sound of the wings of the living creatures
the sound of the wheels beside them
the sound of a great earthquake
